item.title: Half a year with vim
item.description: I started using vim because I was bored. Likely, I code in go, so it’s pretty easy to switch. I mean, I tried to do Java with vim for about a week - and it’s a hell. So if your primary language requires massive IDE support, it’s not an option to completely switch to vim. After slightly more than half a year of usage, I improved typing, navigation speed, and general comfort while I code.
